page.title: 07Thorney Attitudes To Youth
page.content: What do the people of{Thorney}think of{fashion}and{young people}in the village? We decided to ask them. These are our results. Most people thought that young people generally behave. We asked the people in Thorney about{vandalism. Most of the{youngsters}said that there is'nt a lot, but when there is it's a pity. There were different tastes in {pop music,}but the favourite group was {WHAM!}and most preferred{breakdance} for dancing. They thought{fashion}in Thorney is quite up to date,but not too outrageous. We asked the younger people what they thought of the older people in Thorney. They said some are a bit grumpy but most are very nice and have lovely characters. We asked the older people if they liked Thorney {now}or in the past. They mostly said they liked it how we live{today.
